boardgame.name: Mechs vs. Minions
约德尔：战斗学院
boardgame.description: Mechs vs. Minions is a cooperative tabletop campaign for 2-4 players. Set in the world of Runeterra, players take on the roles of four intrepid Yordles: Corki, Tristana, Heimerdinger, and Ziggs, who must join forces and pilot their newly-crafted mechs against an army of marauding minions. With modular boards, programmatic command lines, and a story-driven campaign, each mission will be unique, putting your teamwork, programming, and piloting skills to the test._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;There are ten missions in total, and each individual mission will take about 60-90 minutes. The box includes five game boards, four command lines (one for each player), four painted mech miniatures, ability and damage decks, a sand timer, a bomb-like-power source miniature, 6 metal trackers, 4 acrylic shards, 4 dice, and 100 minion miniatures. There also appears to be some large object trying to get out of that sealed box..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Shipping from Dallas, TX. Still in Shrink. Still in Riot_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s shipping box. STORYTIME: When Mechs VS Minions launched, I was one of the many who sat and constantly refreshed Riot_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s site trying to order this game. Time after time, during various stages of the checking out, the site would crash and I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d have to start the checkout process again. After 4 hours, I finally was able to enter all my billing and shipping information successfully and clicked the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Place Order_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; button... only to have the site crash. AGAIN! I hoped against that maybe it might have gone through. But after refreshing my email inbox a dozen times, no email confirmation came through. =( While I was doing this, my girlfriend was also trying to order the game for me as well as a birthday gift to me. Eventually, she was able to succeed and got the coveted email confirmation! HUZZAH! And then... minutes later... another email confirmation came in... in my inbox... from the order I placed that I thought had failed... SO NOW I HAVE 2 AND AM LOOKING FOR A HOME FOR THE STRAGGLER!
